did.head: Descriptive Summary

did.unittitle: Vice President for Academic Affairs Office Records, 1967-1970
did.abstract: The Vice President for Academic Affairs Office Records contain academic and administrative council minutes from 1967-1970. The full finding aid is available.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: An appointment is required for research.Collection is open to research. No interlibrary loan.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Vice President for Academic Affairs Office

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: Given to the University Archive by the Vice President For Academic Affairs Office.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Vice President for Academic Affairs Office Records contain academic and administrative council minutes from 1967-1970. This one box, three folder collection holds academic and administrative council minutes in increments of 1967-1968 (two folders) and 1969-1970.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p:
Box 1: Academic and Administrative Council Minutes 1967-70
Folder 1.Academic and Administrative Council Minutes 1967-68
Folder 2. Academic and Administrative Council Minutes 1967-68
Folder 3. Academic and Administrative Council Minutes 1969-70
